brief: We used Ionic 3 and Cordova to create an application for an android that will eventually be available on the android store. The goal was to upgrade the system of grades ’ display and to add some functionalities.

reflection.text: I have created a short video on my favorite series with music from my favorite artist. I used After Eect to create various eect to amplify my messages. The video is focusing only on the Umbara Arc.
I used blue, red and green for fear, death and enemies.
The main questions are about the duty of soldiers, the consequences of cloning human beings, critical opinions and fear of death.

reflection2.text: The Inktober is a drawing challenge in October where everyday you have to draw based on a chosen word. You can see the official list.

This challenge is an opportunity to experiment and to explore. I almost always choose movies ’ references or characters. Aliens or super beings are always inspiring because the lightning donc aect them like ordinary humans because of their skin, armor, power …
